org.drip.quant.common

Class CollectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.common.CollectionUtil

  • public class CollectionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The CollectionUtil class implements generic utility functions used in DRIP modules. Some of the functions it exposes are: - Map Merging Functionality - Map Key Functionality - key-value flatteners, key prefixers - Decompose/transform List/Set/Array Contents - Multi-Dimensional Map Manipulator Routines - Construct n-derivatives array from Slope - Collate Wengerts to a bigger Wengert
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
